alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 8:47AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Webb and southwestern La Salle Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 847 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of La Esperanza Ranch Airport, or 23 miles west of Encinal, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Encinal, Las Tiendas, Botines, La Esperanza Ranch Airport, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge and Callaghan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 19 and 50. US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
